Package uk.ac.ebi.ep.sitemap.advanced

Interface Summary
ISitemapUrl  
ISitemapUrlRenderer<T extends ISitemapUrl>  
 

Class Summary
AbstractSitemapGeneratorOptions<THIS extends AbstractSitemapGeneratorOptions<THIS>>  
CustomURL  
GoogleCodeSitemapGenerator Builds a code sitemap for Google Code Search.
GoogleCodeSitemapUrl One configurable Google Code Search URL.
GoogleCodeSitemapUrl.Options Options to configure Google Code Search URLs
GoogleGeoSitemapGenerator Builds a Google Geo Sitemap (which points to KML or GeoRSS files).
GoogleGeoSitemapUrl One configurable Geo URL, either KML or GeoRSS.
GoogleGeoSitemapUrl.Options Options to configure Geo URLs
GoogleMobileSitemapGenerator Builds a Google Mobile Sitemap, consisting of only mobile-friendly content.
GoogleMobileSitemapUrl One configurable Google Mobile Search URL.
GoogleMobileSitemapUrl.Options Options to configure mobile URLs
GoogleNewsSitemapGenerator Builds a sitemap for Google News.
GoogleNewsSitemapUrl One configurable Google News Search URL.
GoogleNewsSitemapUrl.Options Options to configure Google News URLs
GoogleVideoSitemapGenerator Builds a sitemap for Google Video search.
GoogleVideoSitemapUrl One configurable Google Video Search URL.
GoogleVideoSitemapUrl.Options Options to configure Google Video URLs
SitemapGeneratorBuilder<G extends SitemapGenerator<?,?>> A convenience class to let you configure options straightforwardly; don't instantiate by hand.
SitemapIndexGenerator Builds a sitemap index, which points only to other sitemaps.
SitemapIndexGenerator.Options Options to configure sitemap index generation
SitemapIndexUrl Represents a single sitemap for inclusion in a sitemap index.
SitemapValidator Validates sitemaps and sitemap indexes
UrlUtils  
W3CDateFormat Formats and parses dates in the six defined W3C date time formats.
WebSitemapGenerator Generates a regular old sitemap (USE THIS CLASS FIRST).
WebSitemapUrl Encapsulates a single URL to be inserted into a Web sitemap (as opposed to a Geo sitemap, a Mobile sitemap, a Video sitemap, etc which are Google specific).
WebSitemapUrl.Options Options to configure web sitemap URLs
 

Enum Summary
ChangeFreq How frequently the page is likely to change.
GoogleCodeSitemapUrl.FileType The type of code represented by this URL
GoogleCodeSitemapUrl.License The license of the code represented by this URL
GoogleGeoSitemapUrl.Format The two Geo URL formats: KML and GeoRSS
W3CDateFormat.Pattern The six patterns defined by W3C, plus W3CDateFormat.Pattern.AUTO configuration
